mapper.select: SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , C1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM -- 계약확정일시 , C1.CNTR_CAN_DTM -- 계약취소일시 , C2.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD -- 계약상세상태코드 , C4.RCGVP_KNM --계약자명 , (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST X1 WHERE C2.CNTR_NO = X1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = X1.CNTR_SN AND X1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND X1.HIST_END_DTM = '99991231' AND X1.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '202') AS STOP_YN , S1.IST_DT , S1.REQD_DT , S1.CPS_DT , C2.BASE_PD_CD -- 판매상품코드(saleCd) , P1.PD_NM BASE_PD_NM -- 판매상품명 , S1.PDCT_PD_CD -- 제품상품코드(pdCd) , P2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PDCT_PD_GRP_CD , NVL(P2.PD_PRP_VAL03, 0) AS PDCT_PD_SIZE FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C2 ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C3 ON C2.CNTR_NO = C3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = C3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND C3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C3.VL_STRT_DTM AND C3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C4 ON C3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ S1 ON C2.CNTR_NO = S1.CNTR_NO AND C2.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 ON C2.BASE_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON S1.PDCT_PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND C2.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND C2.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}

SELECT S2.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , S2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , S2.MTR_STAT_CD AS DTA_STAT_CD , S1.VST_CNFMDT , S1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , S2.PD_CD PDCT_PD_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ S1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ S2 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{cstSvAsnNo}

SELECT O1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AS NEW_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , A1.WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD AS NEW_WK_ACPTE_STAT_CD , O1.MTR_STAT_CD AS NEW_MTR_STAT_CD , A1.VST_CNFMDT AS NEW_WK_ACPTE_DT , A1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD AS NEW_WK_PRGS_STAT_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ O1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A1 ON O1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND O1.AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{asIstOjNo} AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ E1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ O1 ON E1.CNTR_NO = O1.CNTR_NO AND E1.CNTR_SN = O1.CNTR_SN AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ I1 ON O1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND I1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND O1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE (CASE WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LIKE '11%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,2) --설치 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} != '3124' AND #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LIKE '31%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,2) --전기레인지 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} = '3124' THEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} --전기레인지 상판교체 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LKE '32%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,2) --교체 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LIKE '331%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,3) --이전분리 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LIKE '332%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,3) --이전재설치 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LIKE '34%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,2) --철거 WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} LIKE '35%' THEN SUBSTR(#{newSvBizDclsfCd},1,2) --부가AS ELSE #{newSvBizDclsfCd} END) || '%' AND I1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') AND I1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND I1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND E1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', #{newSvBizDclsfCd}, #{session.langId}) FROM DUAL

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ O1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A1 ON O1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND O1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3123' --토탈체인지서비스 AND O1.PD_CD IN ('WM03100032') --최고급형안마의자([ASIS] PD_CD = 49242000000) AND A1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ O1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ A1 ON O1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND O1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '3124' --전기레인지 글라스 상판 교체 서비스 AND O1.PD_CD IN ('WM05100114', 'WM05100966', 'WM05100967') --전기레인지([ASIS] PD_CD = 49280000000, 49281000000, 49282000000) AND A1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ O1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ A1 ON O1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND O1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND O1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE '2178%' AND A1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND REFRI_DV_CD = '1' AND ITM_PD_CD IN ('WM07105864', 'WM07105786', 'WM07105787', 'WM07105788')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{asIstOjNo}

SELECT TRIM(#{inChnlDvCd}) AS NEW_IN_CHNL_DV_CD , TRIM(#{svBizHclsfCd}) AS NEW_SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , (CASE WHEN TRIM(#{inChnlDvCd}) IN ('3', '4') AND #{mtrStatCd} IN ('2','3') AND #{rcpdt} IS NULL THEN (SELECT I1.RCPDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ I1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ I2 ON I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = I2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND I2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND I1.IN_CHNL_DV_CD = TRIM(#{inChnlDvCd}) AND I1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = TRIM(#{svBizHclsfCd}) AND I1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{newSvBizDclsfCd} AND I2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '00' AND I1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND I1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} ) WHEN #{rcpdt} IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ELSE #{rcpdt} END) AS NEW_RECPDT , (CASE WHEN TRIM(#{inChnlDvCd}) IN ('3','4') AND #{mtrStatCd} IN ('2','3') AND #{asIstOjNo} IS NULL THEN (SELECT SUBSTR(I1.AS_IST_OJ_NO,16) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ I1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ I2 ON I1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = I2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND I2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND I1.IN_CHNL_DV_CD = TRIM(#{inChnlDvCd}) AND I1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = TRIM(#{svBizHclsfCd}) AND I1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{newSvBizDclsfCd} AND I2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '00' AND I1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND I1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} )) WHEN #{asIstOjNo} IS NULL THEN LPAD(SQ_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ$AS_IST_OJ_NO.NEXTVAL,5,'0') ELSE SUBSTR(#{asIstOjNo},16) END) AS NEW_REQ FROM DUAL
SELECT MEXNO_ENCR FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ SELECT #{newAsIstOjNo} AS AS_IST_OJ_NO , A.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , A.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , C1.CNTR_CST_NO AS CNTR_CST_NO , C3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AS CNTR_ADRPC_ID , #{newInChnlDvCd} AS IN_CHNL_DV_CD , #{newSvBizHclsfCd} AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , #{newSvBizDclsfCd} AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , '' AS RCP_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , #{rcpOgTpCd} AS RCP_OG_TP_CD , #{rcpIchrPrtnrNo} AS RCP_ICHR_PRTNR_NO , #{newRcpdt} AS RCPDT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS FNL_RCPDT /*최종접수일자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') AS FNL_RCP_HH /*최종접수시간*/ , (CASE WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '1' THEN TRIM(#{urgtYn}) /*고객센터 접수건은 고객센터에서 내려준 값 사용*/ ELSE (SELECT DECODE(PRTNR_CLSF_CD,'1','3','2') /*긴급여부 : 0 정상설치 1 당일긴급(SMS) 2 ENG 3 웰스매니저 4 고객요청 */ FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd}) END) AS URGT_YN , #{vstRqdt} AS VST_RQDT /*방문요청일자*/ , #{vstAkHh} AS VST_AK_HH /*방문요청시간*/ , #{cnslTpHclsfCd} AS CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD /*상담유형 1(대)*/ , #{cnslTpMclsfCd} AS CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD /*상담유형 2(중)*/ , #{cnslTpLclsfCd} AS CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD/* 상담유형 3(소)*/ , DECODE(A.IST_DT,NULL,NULL,'00000000',NULL ,DECODE(SIGN(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) - ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(A.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),C9.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N)),1,'2','1')) AS AS_REFRI_DV_CD /*AS유무상구분코드*/ , DECODE(A.IST_DT,NULL,NULL,'00000000',NULL ,DECODE(SIGN(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) - ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(A.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),C9.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N)),1,'2','1')) AS BFSVC_REFRI_DV_CD /*BS유무상구분코드*/ , #{cstCnrRefriDvCd} AS CST_CNR_REFRI_DV_CD /*고객센터유무상구분코드*/ , #{smsFwYn} AS SMS_FW_YN /*SMS발송여부*/ , #{dpDvCd} AS DP_DV_CD /*입금구분코드*/ , NVL(#{svEtAmt},0) AS SV_ET_AMT /*서비스예상금액*/ , (SELECT OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = FN_SVPD_LOCARA_PRTNR_02(TRIM(T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP), PDCT_PD_CD, #{newSvBizDclsfCd}, NVL(#{vstRqdt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')))) AS SV_CNR_OG_ID /*서비스센터조직ID*/ , #{mtrStatCd} AS MTR_STAT_CD /*자료상태코드*/ , A.PDCT_PD_CD AS PD_CD /*상품코드*/ , C0.PD_GD_CD AS PD_GD_CD /*상품등급코드*/ , T8.PD_PRP_VAL01 AS PD_USWY_CD /*상품용도코드*/ , '' AS CST_SV_ASN_NO /*고객서비스배정번호*/ , #{cnslDtlpTpCd} AS CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD /*상담 세부유형*/ , (CASE WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '1' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '2' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') || (SELECT CASE WHEN PRTNR_CLSF_CD = '1' THEN CHR(13) || CHR(10) || PRTNR_KNM || 'WM(' || CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ||'-'|| #{mexnoEncr} ||'-'|| CRAL_IDV_TNO || ')' WHEN PRTNR_CLSF_CD = '2' THEN CHR(13) || CHR(10) || PRTNR_KNM || 'ENG(' || CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ||'-'|| #{mexnoEncr} ||'-'|| CRAL_IDV_TNO || ')' ELSE CHR(13) || CHR(10) || PRTNR_KNM || '(' || CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ||'-'|| #{mexnoEncr} ||'-'|| CRAL_IDV_TNO || ')' END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{#{session.employeeIDNumber}}) WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '3' THEN (CASE WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} IN ('1121', '1122') THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', #{newSvBizDclsfCd}, #{session.langId}) || ': ' || SUBSTR(TRIM(#{cntrNoB}), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TRIM(#{cntrNoB}), 5) || ' ' || (SELECT T2.PD_ABBR_NM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNoB} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSnB}) || CHR(13) || CHR(10) || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') END) ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(P_MEMO,CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') END) AS CNSL_MO_CN /*상담메모내용*/ , O.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , O.MEXNO_ENCR , O.CRAL_IDV_TNO , C4.RCGVP_KNM AS ISTLL_KNM /*설치고객명*/ , C4.ADR_DV_CD AS ADR_DV_CD /*주소구분(지번/도로명)*/ , T3.RNADR AS IST_ADR /*도로명주소*/ , T3.RDADR AS IST_DTL_ADR /*도로명상세주소*/ , 'N' AS DTA_DL_YN
FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ A INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C0 /*계약상세*/ ON C0.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND C0.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND C0.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C9 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C9.CNTR_NO = C0.CNTR_NO AND C9.CNTR_SN = C0.CNTR_SN AND C9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C0.CNTR_NO AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON C3.DTL_CNTR_NO = C0.CNTR_NO AND C3.DTL_CNTR_SN = C0.CNTR_SN AND C3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /*설치주소*/ AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C3.VL_STRT_DTM AND C3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T3 /*주소기본*/ ON T3.ADR_ID = C4.ADR_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T8 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T8.PD_CD = A.SV_PD_CD /*서비스상품코드*/ AND T8.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SCHD' /*상품확장속성그룹코드 : AFS AS, PART AS부품, SCHD 일정관리*/ AND T8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS O /*파트너기본*/ ON O.PRTNR_NO = C1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND O.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND A.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE (SELECT A1.AS_IST_OJ_NO , A1.CNTR_NO , A1.CNTR_SN , A1.CNTR_CST_NO , A1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID , A1.IN_CHNL_DV_CD , A1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , A1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , A1.RCP_SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , A1.RCP_OG_TP_CD , A1.RCP_ICHR_PRTNR_NO , A1.RCPDT , A1.FNL_RCPDT , A1.FNL_RCP_HH , A1.URGT_YN , A1.VST_RQDT , A1.VST_AK_HH , A1.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD , A1.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD , A1.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD , A1.AS_REFRI_DV_CD , A1.BFSVC_REFRI_DV_CD , A1.CST_CNR_REFRI_DV_CD , A1.SMS_FW_YN , A1.DP_DV_CD , A1.SV_ET_AMT , A1.SV_CNR_OG_ID , A1.MTR_STAT_CD , A1.PD_CD , A1.PD_GD_CD , A1.PD_USWY_CD , A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , A1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , A1.CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD , A1.CNSL_MO_CN , A1.ISTLL_KNM , A1.ADR_DV_CD , A1.IST_ADR , A1.IST_DTL_ADR , A1.DTA_DL_YN , A1.FST_RGST_DTM , A1.FST_RGST_USR_ID , A1.FST_RGST_PRG_ID , A1.FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , A1.FNL_MDFC_DTM , A1.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , A1.FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , A1.FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID , C4.RCGVP_KNM , T3.RNADR , T3.RDADR , T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP , C4.ADR_DV_CD , C9.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N , C9.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N , A2.PDCT_PD_CD , A2.IST_DT , C0.PD_GD_CD , T8.PD_PRP_VAL01 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ A1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ A2 ON A1.CNTR_NO = A2.CNTR_NO AND A1.CNTR_SN = A2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C0 /*계약상세*/ ON C0.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND C0.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND C0.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL C9 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON C9.CNTR_NO = C0.CNTR_NO AND C9.CNTR_SN = C0.CNTR_SN AND C9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C0.CNTR_NO AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL C3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON C3.DTL_CNTR_NO = C0.CNTR_NO AND C3.DTL_CNTR_SN = C0.CNTR_SN AND C3.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' /*설치주소*/ AND C3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN C3.VL_STRT_DTM AND C3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS C4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON C4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = C3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND C4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T3 /*주소기본*/ ON T3.ADR_ID = C4.ADR_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T8 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T8.PD_CD = A.SV_PD_CD /*서비스상품코드*/ AND T8.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SCHD' /*상품확장속성그룹코드 : AFS AS, PART AS부품, SCHD 일정관리*/ AND T8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS O /*파트너기본*/ ON O.PRTNR_NO = C1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND O.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND A1.AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{newAsIstOjNo} ) SET A1.MTR_STAT_CD = #{mtrStatCd} , A1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{newSvBizDclsfCd} , A1.FNL_RCPDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , A1.FNL_RCP_HH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , A1.URGT_YN = (CASE WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '1' THEN TRIM(#{urgtYn}) /*고객센터 접수건은 고객센터에서 내려준 값 사용*/ ELSE (SELECT DECODE(OG_TP_CD,'W02','3','2') /*긴급여부 : 0 정상설치 1 당일긴급(SMS) 2 ENG 3 웰스매니저 4 고객요청 */ FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber}) END) --긴급구분 1 당일긴급(SMS) 2 ENG 3 웰스매니저 4 고객 , A1.VST_RQDT = #{vstRqdt} , A1.VST_AK_HH = #{vstAkHh} , A1.SMS_FW_YN = #{smsFwYn} , A1.DP_DV_CD = #{dpDvCd} /*입금구분코드*/ , A1.SV_ET_AMT = NVL(#{svEtAmt},0) /*서비스예상금액*/ , A1.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = #{cnslTpHclsfCd} /*상담유형 1(대)*/ , A1.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = #{cnslTpMclsfCd} /*상담유형 2(중)*/ , A1.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD = #{cnslTpLclsfCd} /* 상담유형 3(소)*/ , A1.CNSL_DTLP_TP_CD = #{cnslDtlpTpCd} , A1.CNSL_MO_CN = (CASE WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '1' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '2' THEN REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') || (SELECT CASE WHEN PRTNR_CLSF_CD = '1' THEN CHR(13) || CHR(10) || PRTNR_KNM || 'WM(' || CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ||'-'|| #{mexnoEncr} ||'-'|| CRAL_IDV_TNO || ')' WHEN PRTNR_CLSF_CD = '2' THEN CHR(13) || CHR(10) || PRTNR_KNM || 'ENG(' || CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ||'-'|| #{mexnoEncr} ||'-'|| CRAL_IDV_TNO || ')' ELSE CHR(13) || CHR(10) || PRTNR_KNM || '(' || CRAL_LOCARA_TNO ||'-'|| #{mexnoEncr} ||'-'|| CRAL_IDV_TNO || ')' END FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRTNR_NO = #{#{session.employeeIDNumber}}) WHEN #{newInChnlDvCd} = '3' THEN (CASE WHEN #{newSvBizDclsfCd} IN ('1121', '1122') THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', #{newSvBizDclsfCd}, #{session.langId}) || ': ' || SUBSTR(TRIM(#{cntrNoB}), 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(TRIM(#{cntrNoB}), 5) || ' ' || (SELECT T2.PD_ABBR_NM FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T2 ON T1.BASE_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD WHERE CNTR_NO = #{cntrNoB} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSnB}) || CHR(13) || CHR(10) || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{cnslMoCn},CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') END) ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(P_MEMO,CHR(2),''), CHR(15), ''), CHR(26), '') END) , A1.CST_CNR_REFRI_DV_CD = #{cstCnrRefriDvCd} , A1.ISTLL_KNM = C4.RCGVP_KNM , A1.IST_ADR = T3.RNADR , A1.IST_DTL_ADR = T3.RDADR , A1.ADR_DV_CD = C4.ADR_DV_CD , A1.AS_REFRI_DV_CD = DECODE(A.IST_DT,NULL,NULL ,'00000000',NULL ,DECODE(SIGN(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) - ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(A.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),C9.FRISU_AS_PTRM_N)),1,'2','1')) , A1.BFSVC_REFRI_DV_CD = DECODE(A.IST_DT,NULL,NULL ,'00000000',NULL ,DECODE(SIGN(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) - ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(A.IST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),C9.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N)),1,'2','1')) , A1.SV_CNR_OG_ID = (SELECT OG_CD FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND PRTNR_NO = FN_SVPD_LOCARA_PRTNR_02(TRIM(T3.NEW_ADR_ZIP), PDCT_PD_CD, #{newSvBizDclsfCd}, NVL(#{vstRqdt}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')))) , A1.PD_CD = A.PDCT_PD_CD , A1.PD_GD_CD = C0.PD_GD_CD , A1.PD_USWY_CD = T8.PD_PRP_VAL01
mapper.select: SELECT #{puCstSvAsnNo} AS PU_CST_SV_ASN_NO , (SELECT PD_PRP_VAL19 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL AND PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND PD_PRP_VAL31 = T1.SDING_PD_CD) AS ITM_KND_CD , T1.SDING_PD_CD AS PART_CD , T1.SDING_QTY AS PART_QTY , T1.RECAP_CS_AMT AS PART_AMT , (CASE WHEN T1.RECAP_CS_AMT > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS REFRI_YN FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_PRCHS_PROCS_TEMP

SELECT (CASE WHEN #{mtrStatCd} IN ('2', '3') THEN SUBSTR(CST_SV_ASN_NO, 1, 1) ELSE #{newSvBizHclsfCd} END) AS ASN_SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , (CASE WHEN #{mtrStatCd} IN ('2', '3') THEN SUBSTR(CST_SV_ASN_NO, 2, 8) ELSE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') END) AS ASN_DT , (CASE WHEN #{mtrStatCd} IN ('2', '3') THEN SUBSTR(CST_SV_ASN_NO, 10) ELSE LPAD(SQ_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ$CST_SV_ASN_NO.NEXTVAL,10,'0') END) AS ASN_REQ FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND AS_IST_OJ_NO = #{newAsIstOjNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ SET DTA_DL_YN = 'Y'
WHERE 1=1 AND CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{asnCstSvAsnNo} AND WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10')
mapper.select: SELECT #{newSvBizHclsfCd} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , LPAD(SQ_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ$CST_SV_ASN_NO.NEXTVAL,10,'0') FROM DUAL
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_HIST SELECT #{asnCstSvAsnNo} , (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(CST_SV_ASN_SN),0)+1,3,'0') FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_HIST WHERE 1=1 AND CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{asnCstSvAsnNo} ) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , E1.CNTR_NO , E1.CNTR_SN , C1.CNTR_CST_NO , #{vstRqdt} , #{vstAkHh} , #{vstRqdt} , #{vstAkHh} , #{asnSvBizHclsfCd} , #{newSvBizDclsfCd} , #{ichrCnrCd} , #{asnDt} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , #{ichrOgTpCd} , #{ichrPrtnrNo} , '' --없던컬럼이라 비워놓음. , #{rpbLocaraCd} , (SELECT PD_PRP_VAL20 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL WHERE PD_CD = E1.PDCT_PD_CD AND PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , '' , '' , (CASE WHEN #{inChnlDvCd} = '9' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END) , (CASE WHEN #{inChnlDvCd} = '9' THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE '' END) , (CASE WHEN #{inChnlDvCd} = '9' THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') ELSE '' END) , '' , '' , '' , FN_SVPD_WRK_GRP_01(#{newPdCd}, #{newSvBizDclsfCd}, #{vstRqdt}) , '00' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , 'N'
FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ E1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS C1 /*계약기본*/ ON C1.CNTR_NO = E1.CNTR_NO AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND E1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo}
mapper.select: SELECT W3TH FROM (SELECT W1TH FROM (SELECT BASE_Y , BASE_MM , BASE_D , DF_YN , PHLD_YN , (CASE WHEN (BASE_D IN ('1','6','7') OR DF_YN IS NOT NULL OR PHLD_YN IS NOT NULL) THEN '' ELSE TRIM(BASE_Y||BASE_MM||BASE_D) END) AS W1TH , (CASE WHEN (BASE_D != '1' AND DF_YN IS NULL AND PHLD_YN IS NULL) THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BASE_Y||BASE_MM||BASE_D, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD' END) AS W3TH FROM TB_SVPD_SV_CLND_BAS WHERE BASE_Y || BASE_MM || BASE_D BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{vstRqdt},1,6)||'01', 'YYYYMMDD'), -5),'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{vstRqdt},1,6)||'01', 'YYYYMMDD'), 5),'YYYYMMDD') ) WHERE W3TH IS NOT NULL GROUP BY W1TH, W3TH ) WHERE W3TH = #{vstRqdt} AND ROWNUM = 1;

SELECT COUNT(1) AS EXP_MAT , SUM((CASE WHEN (SELECT T4.PD_PRP_VAL01 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.OJ_PD_CD AND T2.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 ON T2.BASE_PD_CD = T3.PD_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T4 ON T3.PD_CD = T4.PD_CD AND T4.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S1.SDING_PD_CD = T2.OJ_PD_CD) LIKE '6%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) AS SDING_EXP_MAT , SUM(S1.RECAP_CS_AMT) AS EXP_MAT_SUM FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_PRCHS_PROCS_TEMP S1

SELECT LPAD(NVL((SELECT MAX(SPP_PLAN_SN) + 1 FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_PLAN_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND SPP_ORD_NO = (#{newSvBizHclsfCd} || #{newRcpdt} || #{newReq}) AND SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{newSvBizDclsfCd}), '01'), 2, '0') /*오류 방지를 위해 NULL 일 경우 01 입력해줌*/ FROM DUAL

SELECT BAS1.PD_NM AS SALE_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS BAS INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL REL ON BAS.PD_CD = REL.OJ_PD_CD AND REL.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND REL.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS BAS1 ON REL.BASE_PD_CD = BAS1.PD_CD AND BAS1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE BAS.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND REL.OJ_PD_CD = #{newSaleCd}

SELECT DISTINCT NVL(T2.PD_PRP_VAL03, 0) AS PD_SIZE FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL T3 ON T1.PD_CD = T3.OJ_PD_CD AND T3.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND (CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{newSaleCd}) <= 4 THEN TRIM(T3.BASE_PD_CD) ELSE TRIM(T1.PD_CD) END) = TRIM(#{newSaleCd})
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_EXP_IZ ( CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , SPP_ORD_NO , SPP_PLAN_SN , SDING_SN , SDING_PD_CD , SDING_QTY , RECAP_CS_AMT , SOW_DT , DTA_DL_YN
) SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , SPP_ORD_NO , SPP_PLAN_SN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SOW_DT, SDING_PD_CD ASC) AS SDING_SN , SDING_PD_CD , NVL(SDING_QTY,0) , NVL(RECAP_CS_AMT,0) , SOW_DT , DTA_DL_YN , FST_RGST_DTM , FST_RGST_USR_ID , FST_RGST_PRG_ID , FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , FNL_MDFC_DTM , FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID FROM (/*모종 + 배양액*/ SELECT #{cntrNo} AS CNTR_NO , '00' AS CNTR_SN , #{newSvBizHclsfCd} AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , #{newSvBizDclsfCd} AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , #{newSvBizHclsfCd} || #{newRcpdt} || #{newReq} AS SPP_ORD_NO , #{sppPlanSn} AS SPP_PLAN_SN , '' AS SDING_SN , (SELECT (CASE WHEN #{pdSize} = 'FarmMini' AND PD_CD = 'WM07105747' THEN 'WM07105773' WHEN #{pdSize} = 'FarmMini' AND PD_CD = 'WM07105748' THEN 'WM07105774' WHEN T1.PD_CD IN ('WM07105703', 'WM07105704') THEN 'WM07105708' WHEN T1.PD_CD = 'WM07105705' THEN 'WM07105709' WHEN T1.PD_CD IN ('WM07105747', 'WM07105745') THEN 'WM07105751' WHEN T1.PD_CD IN ('WM07105746', 'WM07105748') THEN 'WM07105752' ELSE T1.PD_CD END) FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.OJ_PD_CD AND T2.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.BASE_PD_CD = S1.SDING_PD_CD ) AS SDING_PD_CD , S1.SDING_QTY AS SDING_QTY , S1.RECAP_CS_AMT AS RECAP_CS_AMT , (CASE WHEN (SELECT P2.PD_PRP_VAL19 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL P3 ON P1.PD_CD = P3.OJ_PD_CD AND P3.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND P3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM WHERE P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P3.BASE_PD_CD = S1.SDING_PD_CD ) = '6' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{vstRqdt}) - (SELECT P2.PD_PRP_VAL01 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_REL P3 ON P1.PD_CD = P3.OJ_PD_CD AND P3.PD_REL_TP_CD = '05' AND P3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN VL_STRT_DTM AND VL_END_DTM WHERE P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND P3.BASE_PD_CD = S1.SDING_PD_CD), 'YYYYMMDD') END) AS SOW_DT , 'N' AS DTA_DL_YN , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS FST_RGST_DTM , #{session.userId} AS FST_RGST_USR_ID , #{session.pageId} AS FST_RGST_PRG_ID , #{session.ogId} AS FST_RGST_DEPT_ID , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS FNL_MDFC_DTM , #{session.userId} AS FNL_MDFC_USR_ID , #{session.pageId} AS FNL_MDFC_PRG_ID , #{session.ogId} AS FNL_MDFC_DEPT_ID FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_PRCHS_PROCS_TEMP S1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ SET SV_CNR_OG_ID = '71394' , AC221_EMP_ID_ENG = '28714'
WHERE 1=1 AND CST_SV_ASN_NO = #{asnCstSvAsnNo}
